articles.title: EU Budgets €210m for Humanitarian Interventions in Sahel, Central Africa - THISDAY Newspapers
articles.description: By Michael Olugbode The European Union (EU) has budgeted €210 million for humanitarian interventions for countries in the Sahel and Central Africa in the ongoing year 2021. The eight countries to b…

By Michael Olugbode
The European Union (EU) has budgeted 210 million for humanitarian interventions for countries in the Sahel and Central Africa in the ongoing year 2021.
